Class TheGuardianJsonAdapter

  • java.lang.Object

extends Adapter
    Adapter for The Guardian API

      Default call to the API which downloads just one page with no specified query

      Calls The Guardian's API and saves the entire json response into the appropriate folder in the assets.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TheGuardianJsonAdapter

        public TheGuardianJsonAdapter()
        Constructs a TheGuardianJsonAdapter with the default folder path "./assets/theguardian/". The folder path is specified by the superclass Adapter.

      • TheGuardianJsonAdapter

        public TheGuardianJsonAdapter(String folderPath)
        Constructs a TheGuardianJsonAdapter with the specified folder path.
        Parameters:
        folderPath - The folder path where the JSON files are located.

    • Method Detail

      • loadAllArticles

        public void loadAllArticles()
        Loads a list of all the article files from the folder, then it calls the loadArticlesFromList method to load the articles from the file list.
        Overrides:
        loadAllArticles in class Adapter

      • loadArticlesFromList

        public void loadArticlesFromList(File[] files)
        Loads articles from the specified list of files.
        Specified by:
        loadArticlesFromList in class Adapter
        Parameters:
        files - The array of files containing the articles in JSON format.

      • callApi

        public File[] callApi(int pages,
                      String query)
        Calls The Guardian's API and saves the entire json response into the appropriate folder in the assets. The called endpoint is https://content.guardianapis.com/search?api-key=********&page=i&show-fields=bodyText&page-size=200&q=query
        Parameters:
        pages - the number of pages to be downloaded
        query - the search query to use for the API call
        Returns:
        an array of downloaded files containing the API responses

      • callApi

        public void callApi()
        Default call to the API which downloads just one page with no specified query

      • callApi

        public void callApi(int pages)
        Call to the API which downloads the specified number of pages with no specified query
        Parameters:
        pages - the number of pages to download
